job title: Tier III Customer Support Data Analyst
job description:
PSI Pax is currently recruiting for Tier III Customer Support Data Analyst to support our customer in Yorktown, VA.

Duties&Responsibilities:
  • Provides a wide-range of assistance to customers including but not limited to:
  • Non-Routine and complex customer support requirements
  • Reorganizations and other customer events that require master data maintenance
  • Integration with external system interfaces
  • Custom data queries and reporting
  • Support of critical customer business events (such as Fiscal Year close) by providing data management; help for complex issues; and data extraction and analysis
  • Supporting requirements related to:
    •
  • System/user access
  • Access/procedural questions
  • Application workflow
  • Connectivity/performance issues
  • Account verifications
  • Provides end-user training through in-person, telephone, and web meetings
  • Supports the development and maintenance of end user training material including training curriculum and desktop guides
  • Analyzes inquiries through use of personal knowledge of the functional subject matter
  • Monitoring customer inquiries for a specific functional area, tracking progress and resolution of escalated inquiries
  • Support the documentation of standard operating procedures
Required Qualifications:
  • At least Four (4) years of experience in customer service is required
  • SQL query development experience is a plus
  • User Account Management experience is a plus
  • Navy Time and Attendance expertise is a plus
  • Security+ certification is desired. Ability to obtain Security+ certification is required.
  • US Citizen with the ability to obtain Secret Clearance is required.
Education Requirements:
  • Bachelor's Degree in an information technology or business discipline
  • An Associate's Degree and two (2) additional years of experience can be substituted for a Bachelor's Degree
  • A High School Diploma and four (4) additional years of experience can be substituted for a Bachelor's Degree
